alert.note: Alert for Greater Lake Tahoe Area (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 28 at 10:59PM PDT until March 29 at 5:00AM PDT by NWS Reno
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM PDT WEDNESDAY... * CHANGES...Update for remainder of the night. * WHAT...Scattered areas of heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to two inches, except up to 5 inches above 7000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 70 mph across Sierra ridgelines. * WHERE...Greater Lake Tahoe Area. * WHEN...Until 5 AM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There may be a brief break in the snowfall early Wednesday morning. However, snow showers are expected to redevelop from late morning through the afternoon with additional accumulations and continued travel impacts expected.
info.instruction: Avoid travel if possible, you could be stuck in your vehicle for many hours. If you must travel, prepare for long delays and carry an emergency kit with extra food, water and clothing. If you stay home, have a backup plan in case of power outages. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
